title: This service can license user content to third parties

tosdr.case: This service can license user content to third parties
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Service state, "You agree that the licenses you grant are royalty-free (except for any payments or credits we expressly agree to pay to you when you make your Submission), perpetual, transferable, sublicensable, irrevocable, and worldwide." The terms "transferable, sublicensable" mean that Courser Hero can license user content to third parties.
